title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7336.3 - Congregate religious activities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7336.3 - Congregate religious activities

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of section
7336.1
(c) of this

Part, youth shall be permitted to congregate in an appropriate area of the
facility for the purpose of religious worship and other religious
activities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7336.3

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
